meanings.definition: Feeling or causing a sudden convulsive movement or series of movements
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was so shuddery that it made her scream with excitement.
meanings.sent2: His shuddery laughter echoed through the room, contagious to all.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected joke caused a shuddery reaction of laughter from the audience.
